{"id":1175613568,"question_id":3262,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1707963798,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1175613568/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Polygon With the Largest Perimeter","memory":"55.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long largestPerimeter(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        if(len<=2) return -1;\n\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        long sum = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            sum+=nums[i];\n        }\n\n        int last = len-1;\n\n        if(nums[last]<sum-nums[last]) return sum;\n        \n        while(last>0 && nums[last]>=sum-nums[last]){\n\n            // System.out.println(sum + \" \" + last);\n            sum-=nums[last];\n            last--;\n\n            if(nums[last]<sum-nums[last]) return sum;\n        }\n\n        //[1,12,1,2,5,50,3]\n        // 1 1 2 3 5 12 50\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-polygon-with-the-largest-perimeter","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
